intro: Brachystelma naorojii, commonly known as the Cape Town star. It is a succulent plant native to South Africa, characterized by its compact, star-shaped flowers. The plant belongs to the Aizoaceae family, known for its adaptations to arid environments. It features fleshy, ribbed stems and small, spiny leaves that help reduce water loss. Brachystelma naorojii blooms in spring, producing vibrant yellow or orange flowers that attract pollinators.
